TopicTitle: No shrouds for solid boosters RT-5 "Flea" and RT-10 "Hammer"

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel Core i7 9750H | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 | RAM: 16 GB

 

There are no shrouds when you attach small TD-12 or TS-12 decouplers to RT-5 "Flea" or RT-10 "Hammer" solid booster. As proof that it is possible to attach normaly decoplers to some solid boosters I can provide a link to a craft consisting entirely of boosters from KSP1:
https://kerbalx.com/Rocketman420/solid-science
You can see on second and third screenshots that solid boosters have shrouds. Or you can do the same in KSP1 by yourself

To better understand the issues, I have attached a screenshot of the current situation in KSP2
